chart_metadata.name: pihole
chart_metadata.description: DNS and Ad-filtering for your network.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to chown files.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to bypass permission checks.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETFCAP
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to set file capabilities.

capabilities.name: SETPCAP
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to set process capabilities.

capabilities.name: NET_ADMIN
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to perform various network-related operations.

capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to bind to a privileged port.

capabilities.name: NET_RAW
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to use raw sockets.

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to kill processes.

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Pi-Hole.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Pi-Hole.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

2.0.10.app_readme:
Pi-hole

Pi-hole is a black hole for Internet advertisements
2.0.10.detailed_readme:
Pi-hole

Pi-hole is a black hole for Internet advertisements

groups.name: Resource Limits
groups.description: Set CPU/memory limits for Kubernetes Pod

questions.label: Storage User ID
questions.description: User ID of the dnsmasq volume being used (application will chown the volume path with specified UID)

questions.label: Storage Group ID
questions.description: Group ID of the dnsmasq volume being used (application will chown the volume path with specified GID)

attrs.label: Configuration Mount Path
attrs.description: Path where the volume will be mounted inside the pod

attrs.label: Enable Custom Host Path for Pihole Configuration Volume

subquestions.label: Host Path for Pihole Configuration Volume

attrs.label: DNSMASQ Mount Path
attrs.description: Path where the volume will be mounted inside the pod

subquestions.label: Host Path for Pihole DNSMASQ Volume

items.label: Host Path Volume
items.description: Add an extra host path volume for Pihole application

attrs.label: Mount Path in Pod
attrs.description: Path where the volume will be mounted inside the pod

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: Host path

questions.label: CPU Limit
questions.description: CPU resource limit allow  plain integer values with suffix m(milli) e.g 1000m, 100.

questions.label: Memory Limit
questions.description: Memory limits is specified by number of bytes. Followed by quantity suffix like E,P,T,G,M,k and Ei,Pi,Ti,Mi,Gi,Ki can also be used. e.g 129e6, 129M,  128974848000m, 123Mi
